description: Unique identifier for this procedure attribute configuration record.
User-facing caption for the attribute shown on procedure forms.
Detailed text explaining the attribute’s purpose in the procedure.
Code indicating the data type for values captured by this attribute; likely references a lookup; confirm with SME.
Maximum allowed length or size for the attribute’s value, based on its data type.
Indicator of whether entering a value is mandatory (1) or optional (0) when completing the procedure.
Likely flag marking this attribute as part of the procedure’s specification/configuration rather than runtime input; confirm with SME.
Unit applicable to numeric values for this attribute (e.g., miles, hours); 'N/A' when not measured.
Value automatically populated when the attribute is first presented, if none is entered.
Sequence position controlling where the attribute appears relative to others on forms and reports.
System timestamp for the most recent update to this record, used for auditing.
Free-form notes about configuration decisions, edge cases, or context for this attribute.
Timestamp of the last change recorded by the user-facing application; may duplicate the system modified time; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that created this record.
Date and time when the record was created by a user.
Identifier of the user account that most recently updated this record.
Date and time of the latest user-initiated modification to this record.
